name: Underpowered (3rd Alakajam)
description:
You take the role of an alien cast out from their tribe for being too weak.

Invade a human spaceship and sap their power to increase your strength. Evolve to new forms and defeat any enemies you come across.

Underpowered is a top-down maze puzzle game in a sci-fi setting.

Created by Stuart and Ryan this was our first ever game jam and we are extremely please with the result. Was a fantastic learning experience and we hope to compete again in the future.
We would've liked more time to create more levels and more interesting/complex levels but we are pleased to have produced a working prototype for the game in the time.

Feedback is very welcome, let us know what you think!
